data.author: Fine Faces

changelog.release_notes: 1.1 - Noticed that it doesn't always clear the hourly message when the snake starts moving again.  Fixed that.

Version 1.0:

The snake starts each hour at minimum length.  Every minute throughout the hour he eats a fruit, or whatever it is he eats.  By the end of the hour he's massive!

Then he goes onto the next level and he's tiny again.

data.description:
Finally, a 100% accurate and fully lifelike vivarium-on-your-wrist!

This little snake eats a food pellet every minute, on the minute - increasing his score by one each time.  When he's got 60 points, he moves onto the next level - just like a real snake!  Of course, every time he eats food, he grows a bit - by the end of each hour he's massive!

When your battery is low, he forces himself to eat batteries instead of food to subtly let you know what's up.  No Bluetooth connection?  No problem - Mr Snake will gobble down Bluetooth symbols so you're never knowingly disconnected!

He's the best friend you never knew you needed - and you can modify his colours without him even blinking.  How could he - he hasn't even got any eyes!

latest_release.release_notes: 1.1 - Noticed that it doesn't always clear the hourly message when the snake starts moving again.  Fixed that.

data.title: Snake Face
